page.title: 01Description of our area.
page.content: Our grid area encompasses part of Shotley Low Quarter,which locally is referred to as "The Snods",as this is really the hub of life in the Parish.<it is by nature a sparsely populated rural area>. Within our grid there are only two places that could be called Hamlets and no real village.Shotley Field with 9 dwellings is the largest Hamlet,Snods Edge is the next sizeable Hamlet with 4 dwellings plus the Church and Parish Hall. The rest of our area is scattered farms and houses,a filling station and a public house.Although physically very scattered there is an excellent community spirit.
